meanings.definition: A person who is excessively greedy or grasping.
meanings.sent1: The greedheads in the story always wanted more and more.
meanings.sent2: The greedheads at the company only cared about their own wealth.
meanings.sent3: The greedheads in the movie were always scheming to get richer.
meanings.sent4: The greedheads in the market devoured every opportunity for profit.
meanings.sent5: The image of the greedheads hoarding gold coins was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Plural form of greedhead: a group of individuals who prioritize their own selfish desires over the needs of others.
meanings.sent1: When the greedheads gathered, they only discussed ways to benefit themselves.
meanings.sent2: The greedheads in the meeting ignored the community's needs for their own gain.
meanings.sent3: The greedheads at the party fought over the last piece of cake.
meanings.sent4: The greedheads in the boardroom fought like vultures over the deal.
meanings.sent5: The greedheads' selfishness left a trail of destruction in their wake.
